For some reason every time i time warp to point or just randomly the rockets im trying to docks periapsis goes below 0, this just happens randomly and forces both vessels to crash, does anyone know how to fix or improve this.

 

the orbital speed of one of the crafts drops close to 0 so it falls

 

Edited February 25, 2023 by Matthew Cavell
its when i get close to it even though its in an orbit it falls to an impact trajectory on the mun

This is a known bug, and one that is being currently looked into by the devs. They've been hard at work knocking out a metric ton of bugs lately, but it's still an ongoing thing for these early releases of KSP2. Hopefully the next bug fix "patch" solves this soon
